Pro Tip

Spring is the best time for exterior waterproofing. The ground has thawed but the water table is still manageable.

Warning Signs

If you notice any of these signs, contact us immediately:

  • Water stains on basement walls
  • Musty odors or visible mold
  • Cracks in foundation walls

Get Your Free Inspection

Call us at 1-800-WET-GONE or book online for a comprehensive property assessment.

Common Questions

How do I know if I need exterior waterproofing?

Exterior waterproofing is recommended if you have:

  • Recurring basement flooding
  • Foundation cracks with water seepage
  • Failed interior waterproofing systems

Will you damage my landscaping?

We take great care to preserve your landscaping. All plants are carefully removed and replanted after the project.

What's the ROI on waterproofing?

Waterproofing typically returns 30% of the investment in increased home value, plus prevents costly water damage that can exceed $50,000.
